name: TRAUMA MOVE: COMMUNE WITH YOUR ANCHORS

system.description: When you commune with one of your anchors, roll with Spirit.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you only clear 1-trauma; something threatening the anchor interrupts your mediation.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, your anchor soothes your fractured psyche; clear 2-trauma.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, your anchor soothes your fractured psyche; clear 2-trauma.

On a 10+, your communion reveals a way the anchor might be resolved; clear all trauma.
